simplescan
Class Scanner

java.lang.Object
  simplescan.Scanner

public class Scanner
extends java.lang.Object

Scanner encompasses a scanner for the mini-Pascal language.

inputFile - The file to read.
Method Detail

nextToken

public boolean nextToken()
Finds the next token in the input stream. Finds the next token in the attached input stream by implementing a state machine. When the end of file is encountered, this will return false setting both the lexeme and token type to null. When an illegal character or other error is encountered, this will return false setting the token type to null but setting the lexeme to the most recently constructed lexeme.

Returns:
true if a token is found, false otherwise.

getToken

public TokenType getToken()
Returns the token type.

Returns:
The token type of the most recent token.

getLexeme

public java.lang.String getLexeme()
Returns the lexeme.

Returns:
The lexeme of the most recent token.
